dict.string:
# If TM_LATEX_MASTER not set use TM_FILEPATH [ -z "$TM_LATEX_MASTER" ] && export TM_LATEX_MASTER="$TM_FILEPATH"
# Switch to the right directory. cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" cd `dirname "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"` FILE=`basename "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"`
export Tspath=${TM_TSCOPE:=/Applications} echo $Tspath "$Tspath"/TeXniscope.app/Contents/Resources/forward-search.sh "$TM_LINE_NUMBER" "$TM_FILEPATH" `echo $FILE | perl -e 'while(<>){s/\.tex$/.pdf/;print;}' | xargs` ; open -a TeXniscope
